El grupo Divino Niño está en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 8 se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos, pero ellas son conscientes de que deben de seguir trabajando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Norma, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, con ingresos muy bajos, pero sabe que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que hace ventas de ropa, sale a recorrer casa por casa, promocionando sus prendas, también se debe destacar el sacrificio y el esfuerzo y empeño que pone por salir adelante.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de remeras, shorts, blusa, pantalones, camisillas, ropas interiores etc, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group “Divino Niño” (Divine Child) is in its seventh loan cycle as part of the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working to help one another get ahead. The members have taken a poverty elimination survey, which indicated that eight of them are below the poverty line. In other words, these women have very low incomes, but they are aware that they need to continue working.

One of the members is Sra. Norma. Her recent survey indicated that she was at Level 1 on the poverty scale, which indicates a very low income. She knows that she must continue her hard work and applying the necessary behaviors of a successful woman. As a result, she is improving her poverty situation. Her work involves selling clothes. She travels house to house in order to promote her goods. It should also be mentioned that she has made sacrifices and put in the effort needed to get ahead.

Sra. Norma is requesting a loan so that she can buy T-shirts, shorts, blouses, trousers, tank tops, undergarments, and other items in order to complete her business plan. This will help to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, shorts, blouses, trousers, tank tops, undergarments, and other items.

loans.name: Asya

texts.en: Asya is 58 years old and she lives alone in the village of Tatev which is in the Syunik region. She graduated from Yerevan State Institute of National Economy. Today she is engaged in the cultivation of vegetables and fruits, and she also maintains accounting records for private enterprises. This cheerful and nice lady manages to cultivate potatoes, beans, tomatoes, cucumbers, greens and onions. She also has apple, apricot and plum trees. All the harvest that she gathers she manages to sell at the Kapan wholesale markets. Asya is asking for a loan since she needs to buy seeds, seedlings, fertilizers and garden fence mesh.

loans.use: To buy seeds, seedlings and fertilizers.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past thirteen years, she has operated a cashew nuts selling business, selling at the market to her neighbors and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

Mwanajuma is requesting for a loan to purchase six sacks of cashew nuts. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase six sacks of cashew nuts.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is married with one child who attends school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She operates an open-air food business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her dream is to establish a wholesale business in the near future. 

With the Kshs 15,000 she wants to purchase stocks of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar, and rice. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, sugar, and rice to sell.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Please meet 43-year-old Cecelia from St. Paul in Liberia. St. Paul is home to the oldest market in Liberia and is known for their fish due to its location by the sea. St. Paul is a suburb located just outside Monrovia, past the Freeport. It is one of the poorer areas and you will often find its residents living in sub-standard housing. 

Cecelia completed 10 grades and she is married. She has 4 children between the ages of 28 and 22. Only one lives at home. She owns her own table business selling rice, oil and charcoal, etc. for the past 7 years. She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more rice, oil and charcoal, etc. for her business.  

On average, she works 8 hours a day at her business. She started her business with money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by taxi.  She cites her small income as her biggest challenge.  Her favorite part of her business is when customers are buying. In the future, she would like to build a house. She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil and charcoal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas 2 Group

texts.es:
En una ciudad distante llamada Curuguaty, se formo este grupo el grupo mujeres unidas 2, con el fin de trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas a las otras. Comenta que están en una zona bastante alejada y de difícil acceso.
Gloria es una de estas mujeres, tiene una pequeña despensa, con la que surte a su barrio, aunque su negocio sea muy modesto tiene la esperanza de seguir luchando y el día de mañana poder crecer poco a poco. Quiere también que su comunidad pueda ir creciendo y mejorando.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en comprar insumos para su despensa, como ser carnes, pollo, fideos, arroz, y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando en su negocio. Agradecen todas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Unidas 2 group was formed in a distant city called Curuguaty, with the aim of working together and helping each other. The group remarks is in a fairly remote area that is difficult to access.

Gloria is one of these women, she has a small grocery store which provides goods to her neighborhood. Even though the business is very small, she is hopeful of the fact that she will continue fighting and that from day to day it will grow little by little. She also wants her community to continue to grow and improve. Gloria is seeking this loan to invest in the purchase of goods for her store, such as meat, chicken, spaghetti, rice and more to continue working in her business. She is grateful to all for the opportunity that the group is being given.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, spaghetti, rice and other goods.

loans.name: Kabibi

texts.en:
Kabibi is single and a mother of one child who attends school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water.

She sells fruits and green vegetables. She always struggles to improve her grocery stall, trying to sell more and save money to have a more formal establishment. Kabibi is requesting a loan to buy sacks of fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine and her family live in Ijevan. She is a nurse and works at the local clinics in Ijevan. Karine is married and has a big family. She lives with her husband, two sons, and her retired father and mother-in-law. Her two sons are students. Her husband has a private truck with which he makes private deliveries. 

Despite being employed and working every day of the week, they also do farming and agriculture. They have a plot of land and a small farm. On their farm they have two cows, a bull, two piglets and five sheep.  

Karine needs a loan to buy a lot of piglets and animal fodder. She will be very happy to be supported, and she thanks Kiva lenders beforehand.

loans.use: to buy a lot of piglets and animal fodder.

loans.name: Achileo

texts.en:
Achileo is a 42-year-old man. He is married with three children ages 17, 16 and 12. He grows and sells ginger to other ginger traders. 

His other business is brick laying. He would use this loan to buy wood for firing his bricks. 

His dream is for his children to go to university. His challenge is a lack of sufficient capital for running both the ginger and brick businesses. In the photograph is Achileo, his wife and the loan officer.

loans.use: to buy wood for firing his bricks.

loans.name: Eligio Isidro

texts.es:
Eligio hoy tiene 29 años, es un joven emprendedor, y con muchas ansias de salir adelante, es electricista, el anterior crédito de Kiva lo utilizo para la compra de repuestos y posterior venta, con ello pudo inyectar un poco de capital a su trabajo y seguir creciendo.
Solicita un nuevo crédito de Kiva para poder invertirlo en la compra de un equipo de gomería que está en venta a bajo precio y lo quiere aprovechar para así tener otro medio de ingreso, con este equipo quiere poder implementar otra forma de producir ingresos para su familia. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Eligio is now 29 years old. He is a young entrepreneur who has the drive to succeed. Eligio is an electrician and his previous Kiva loan was used to buy parts that he could sell. The loan injected some capital into his business so that he could continue growing.

He is requesting a new loan from Kiva so that he can invest in the purchase of tire repair equipment that is being offered for a low price. Eligio wants to take advantage of this opportunity so that he can have another source of income. With this equipment, he can use it to produce additional earnings for his family. He is grateful for this new opportunity he has received and it will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy tire repair equipment in order to start another business.

loans.name: Jovenes Emprendedores Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad Luque, son cinco jóvenes que se unieron con el objetivo de poder empezar a trabajar y salir adelante para ayudar a sus familias. Ellos están muy entusiasmados ya que podrán ayudar con los ingresos de la casa, y de esa forma poder sentirse útiles.
Uno de estos jóvenes es Liz quien tiene 16 años, está queriendo emprender en Venta de Bijouterie. Ella es una joven de muy buena familia, todos son muy trabajadores, y quiere poder seguir el ejemplo que su mama le dio, y de esa forma poder ayudarles y que se sientan orgullosa de ella.
Pide de este crédito para la compra de canutillos, hilos, pinzas, ect., con lo cual podrá emprender su primer negocio. En la foto del grupo aparecen más personas, ya que sus padres, quienes son sus codeudores están con ellos.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Luque, they are five youngsters who united with the aim of being able to start working and getting ahead in life to help their families. They are very enthusiastic as they will be able to help with the household income and in this way feel useful.

One of these youngsters is Liz who is 16 years old, she wants to start selling jewelry. She is a girl from a very good family, they are all very hardworking and she wants to follow the example set for her by her mother, to help them and for them to feel proud of her. She is asking for this loan to buy bugle beads, threads, tweezers and so on, with which she will start her first business. In the group photo, there are more people as their parents, who are the joint debtors, are with them.

loans.use: to buy bugle beads, threads, tweezers and so on to make jewelry.

loans.name: Valor Y Sacrificio Group

texts.es: La Sra. Doris de 47 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 2 hijos los cuales aún dependen de ella. Lleva 5 años como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica al servicio de costura desde hace más de 5 años. Comenzó por medio de la motivación de sus hijos, quienes la incentivaron a que ponga su propio taller de costura y trabaje como una persona independiente. También se dedica a la artesanía desde hace 15 años aproximadamente. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, Doris ha logrado construir su casa y estabilizarse económicamente. Actualmente ella cubre los gastos de alimentación, mientras que sus hijos la ayudan con los gastos de agua y luz. Su plan para el futuro es ampliar su taller de confección y abrir una tienda de ropa en su domicilio. Ella usó el crédito en la compra de una maquina remalladora para continuar con su servicio de costura. Doris pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Valor y Sacrificio”, el cual está conformado por 7 personas y lleva el cargo de presidenta desde hace 4 meses, ella es la persona que se encuentra de pie en el grupo. La Sra. Doris es la persona que se encuentra de pie con una chompa de color plomo al costado de la otra señora.
texts.en:
Doris, 47, is single and has two children still dependent on her.  She’s been an Edaprospo client for five years.  She’s worked providing sewing services for more than five years.  She started out motivated by her children who encouraged her to set up her own workshop and to work for herself.  She’s also been a craftswoman for about 15 years.  With her effort and work, Doris has succeeded in building her house and to stabilize economically.  She currently pays food costs while her children help her with water and electricity costs.  Her future plan is to expand her sewing workshop and to open a home-based clothing store.

She used her loan to buy a sewing machine to continue with her sewing services.  Doris belongs to the ‘Valor y Sacrificio’ (Valor and Sacrifice) communal bank that consists of 7 members and she’s been its president for the last four months.  She’s the person standing in the group. Doris is the person standing wearing a gray sweater standing next to another lady.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Señora María es casada, su marido Miguel es químico farmacéutico, tienen tres hijos por quienes ellos siempre se han esforzado por poder darles todo y que el día de mañana sean personas de bien.
Ella es comerciante tiene un negocio de mercería y bazar, empezó con una pequeña despensa hace más de 15 años, ahora cuenta con una gran variedad de artículos de mercería, calzados, cubiertos, ahora está abriendo una librería que estará a cargo de su hijo mayor para mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia.
La Sra. solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de una fotocopiadora, para poder mejorar su negocio y dar mejores servicios a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. María is married. Her husband, Miguel, is a pharmaceutical chemist.  They have three children. They have always worked to be able to give them everything, with the hope that they will be good people in the future. 

Mrs. María is a merchant who has a haberdashery and bazaar store. It started as a small storeroom more than 15 years ago. Now it has a large variety of haberdashery articles, footwear, and cutlery. Now she is opening a bookstore that her oldest son will run to increase their income and their family’s quality of life.

Mrs. María is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in buying a photocopier to be able to improve her business and offer her clients better service.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier for the bookstore.

loans.name: Gertrude T.

texts.en:
Please meet 48-year-old Gertrude T., from St. Paul in Liberia. St. Paul is home to the oldest market in Liberia and is known for its fish, due to its location by the sea.  St. Paul is a suburb located just outside Monrovia, past the Freeport.  It is one of the poorer areas and you will often find its residents living in sub-standard housing. 

Gertrude T. completed 12 grades and she is married. Her husband works as a technician. Gertrude T. has four children, between the ages of 32 and 9.  Two of them are in school and they all live at home. 

For the past 11 years, Gertrude T. has owned her own table business, selling fish. She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more fish for her business.  

On average, she works 11 hours at her business. She started her business with money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by taxi.  

Gertrude T. cites low income as her biggest challenge. Her favorite part of her business is the profit-making. In the future, she would like to build a house.

She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Juanita Yadira

texts.es: La Sra. Juanita de 35 años de edad es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Ella y su familia viven en casa de interés social, a la cual le han realizado mejoras con ahorros propios; ellos trabajan en un negocio de transportes: ella como secretaria y el cómo guardia de seguridad. En este momento Juanita tiene la ilusión de construir un cuarto para su hijo el mayor de edad para que tenga su propia privacidad, por lo cual pide apoyo por medio de kiva para cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Sra. Juanita is 35 years old, married, and has two children. She and her family live in a house that was acquired through a government subsidy program. Juanita was able to make improvements using her own savings. She and her husband work for the same transportation company; she is a secretary and he is a security guard.

At the moment, Juanita has plans to build a room for her oldest son who wants to have his own private space. For this reason, she is requesting assistance from Kiva so that she can fulfill this wish.

loans.use: to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en: Mary Ann earns a living through her sari-sari (variety) store, selling various goods and items to the people in San Miguel, Bohol. She is asking for a loan to buy more stock of products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, soda, soap and toiletries, snack foods, and other items. With this, she will be able to attract and cater to more buyers in her store, thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more stock of products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, soda, soap and toiletries, snack foods, and other items.

loans.name: Anthony Alexander

texts.es:
Anthony  es un joven de 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad de clima muy cálido, poseedora de paisajes turísticos muy bonitos y muy visitados en todo el año. Anthony es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sobre todo porque su familia es de bajos recursos y espera poder ser un profesional para apoyar a su familia a salir adelante. Anthony trabaja como empleado en un hotel de su ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo solventa sus estudios de gastronomía  y también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de buffets, con lo cual  tiene un dinero extra para los gastos de  estudio; el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque quiere ser el orgullo de su familia.

Anthony está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá pagar los tramites de su título profesional, lo que le permitirá que lo puedan ascender en su trabajo y poder tener mejores oportunidades laborales, así el podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un restaurante propio y poder seguir apoyando a su familia”.
texts.en:
Anthony is a 20-year-old young man. He lives in the city of Nazca, a city with a warm climate, beautiful touristic landscapes, and many visitors every year. Anthony has many dreams of getting ahead, above all because his family is low income and he hopes to be a professional to be able to help his family get ahead. Anthony works as an employee at a hotel in his city. He works about 9 hours a day and with the fruit of his work he pays for his gastronomy studies. He also has a small business where he sells buffets, so he has extra money to pay for his school expenses. Anthony thinks that he is getting ahead because he is very responsible and above all because he wants to be the pride of his family.

Anthony is very grateful for the Kiva borrowers since thanks to their help he has been able to pay the fees for his degree which will allow him to be able to move up in his work and have greater job opportunities. That way he will be able to continue fighting for his greatest dream: “to have his own restaurant and be able to keep supporting his family.”

loans.use: to pay the fees for his degree.

loans.name: Mikayel

texts.en:
Mikayel is a young and already-skilled farmer. He lives in the village Geghamavan, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Mikayel is married and he lives with his wife, two daughters, and retired mother. 

Mikayel and his nice family are the owners of a small farm, where they keep two cows, one calf, three bulls, and a horse. The farm products (meat and milk) Mikayel sells through the resellers, right from his house. 

Since his father died very early, Mikayel, unwittingly, has become the only bread-winner in his family. Together with farming, he simultaneously works as a plasterer. He is very skilled in wall-plastering and it also brings some money and somewhat improves the family's living conditions. Mikayel also has a plot of land and he mainly cultivates barley and potatoes. All the work around the farm Mikayel does himself and the hardest period for him is the time of hay-mowing.

Mikayel asks for a loan in order to organize hay-mowing activities; he also wants to buy several calves. Greetings and thanks beforehand from Mikayel to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy several calves and to organize hay-mowing activities.

loans.name: Mbocayaty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mbocayaty está en su ciclo número 10 del programa de comité, ellas están mejorando cada día gracias a las capacitaciones que van recibiendo. Son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan incansablemente. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una de ellas en todos sus aspectos de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Francisca, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir con ingresos ni muy altos ni muy bajos, más bien medios, pero sabe que debe seguir esforzándose y trabajando duro. Ella tiene una despensa, y solicita de este crédito para poder comprar insumos y de esa forma surtirla con granos, productos a granel, leche y demás.
texts.en:
The group called “Mbocaytay” is in its 10th cycle in the committee program.  They are improving every day thanks to the training they are getting.  They are female heads of household who strive tirelessly.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey to get to know the situation each one of them is in in all aspects of their lives.

One of the members is Francisca who in the last survey was within poverty level 2, which is with income that’s neither too high nor too low, more in the middle range, but she knows that she must continue to strive and work hard.  She has a grocery store and is asking for this loan to be able to buy merchandise to stock it with grains, bulk items, milk and others.

loans.use: to buy grains, bulk items, milk and others.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 25-year-old single man living with his family. He has owned a mini-market in his town since 2010. He sells dairy products in addition to daily goods such as canned food, juices, bread and sweets. He works very hard to support his family financially. With his requested youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, he will increase his store’s inventory of food provisions and drinks. He is certain that the variety of his merchandise selection will allow him to attract more customers and therefore increase his income. In the future, he intends to expand his business operation into other areas.

loans.use: increase his store’s inventory of food provisions and drinks

loans.name: Andrea Esmeralda

texts.es: Andrea, de 29 años de edad es una joven soltera emprendedora, estudia la carrera de Licenciatura en Psicología Clínica. Además del apoyo de sus padres, también por su cuenta Andrea se dedica a realizar artesanías para vender de esa manera mantener los gastos sus estudios, lo cual no ha sido nada  fácil para ella. Solicita el crédito para pagar el seminario de grado de su carrera, el cual está por culminar y la llena de emoción porque podrá aspira a un empleo y ser el sostén de sus padres. De esa manera retribuirles el apoyo que ellos le han brindado.
texts.en: Andrea is a 29-year-old single businesswoman. She is studying in a Bachelor’s program for Clinical Psychology. In addition to the support from her parents, she also makes crafts to be able to pay for her school expenses, which has not been easy for her. She is requesting this loan to pay for her program’s graduate seminar that is coming up. She is excited about it because she will be able to aspire to a job and support her parents. In this way, she will be able to pay them back for the help they have given her.

loans.use: to pay for a graduate seminar.

loans.name: Melma

texts.en:
Melma is 48 years old and married with four children.

Melma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Melma has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from E-loading (mobile prepaid load).

Melma aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase cash float for his EcoCash money transfer service

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine and her husband live in Kapan. Their two sons are already grown up, married and living separately with their own families. Karine is a nurse and for many years she has worked at the local polyclinics. Now Karine has her own clothes trading business in a rented stall. She has many loyal customers. She sells women's dresses and nightwear, men's trousers and sweaters, as well as shoes and sneakers. Karine’s husband also has his own business; he has a small private atelier and he is an experienced tailor. Karine and her husband help each other very much in their businesses. Karine with her husband bring all the needed products for her stall from the Yerevan wholesale markets once a month. 

They spend the money that they manage to save on their lovely grandchildren.

Karine is requesting a loan to renew her collection of seasonal clothes and buy fabrics for her husband’s atelier.

loans.use: to renew her collection of seasonal clothes and buy fabrics for her husband’s atelier.

loans.name: Julietta

texts.en:
Julietta is from the small village of Tolors, which is located in Syuniq, one of the coldest regions of Armenia. Locals here are mostly involved in agriculture. Mostly they breed cattle and cultivate some limited amount of vegetables. Julietta runs a farm. She keeps 25 sheep, 2 cows and 10 chickens. On her family's land she cultivates potato, wheat, barley, and haricot, and grows nut and appletrees. 
Julietta lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and little grandson. Other family members help Julietta with farming activities. As a skilled and devoted farmer, Julietta works hard to gather enough income and cover her family's needs. Unfortunately, it is very difficult for her to cover many costs that are related to the farm. So, Julietta has applied for this loan. With the loan's help she will purchase a cow, a bull and will cover transportation costs. She wants to rent a truck for transporting the gathered harvest to the local market for sale. The loan is important for Julietta to continue running a successful farm and to ensure a better life for her family.
Julietta waits for your support.

loans.use: to pay for a cow, a bull and cover transportation costs

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en:
Timothy lives in the Muranga area of Kenya, which is a heavy pineapple-producing region. He has two children and has been doing farming for 14 years.  His primary income sources are tea and crops.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: "Feeding my animals." His biggest challenge is: "Spraying pesticides and cultivating." Animals on the farm have been given no names.

Timothy was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: "It offers better terms for farmers." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi Kilimo's required microfinance training session: "Helps farmers access farming assets."

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked, "How will this loan benefit his family?," Timothy replied, "Paying school fees for his children from the income."

As part of Juhudi Kilimo's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Timothy owns the following: 'poultry, pump, and bicycle,' but does not own: 'cow, pig, motorcycle, or automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards, based on this loan. This borrower has in the household: 'mosquito net, electricity, running water, TV, and DVD,' but does not have: 'solar power or sewing machine.'

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy goat.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 29-years-old married man. He has a child who is 2 years old. He operates an electrical accessories shop where he sells phone chargers, cables, batteries and other items. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in an area good for business and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of enough funds to increase his inventory.
 
He will use the Kes 80,000 loan to add to his stock of phone chargers, cables, batteries and other items. His business goal is to grow to a wholesale supplier level and open another outlet within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will get high returns to improve the living standards of his family. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: add to his stock of phone chargers, cables, batteries and other items.

loans.name: Jhon Paul

texts.es:
Jhon es un joven de 22 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y la alegría de sus pobladores. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería mecánica.

Día a día Jhon trabaja como ayudante de  mecánica en un pequeño taller, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día; él cree que está  saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo es cumplido con los clientes.

Jhon está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias  a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar martillos, alicates, llaves, entre otros y materiales como pintura, cemento, entre otros, lo cual podrá mejorar la habitación donde habita, con lo cual mejorar su calidad de vida y podrá tener los materiales necesario para realizar su trabajo, así seguirá luchando para poder hacer realizar su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria y poder apoyar a su familia a salir adelante”.
texts.en:
Jhon, 22, lives in the city of Chincha noted for its hot weather and the joy of its residents.  Because of his limited economic resources he was only able to study up to fifth grade of secondary school but would have liked to have studied Mechanical Engineering.

Day to day Jhon works as a mechanic’s helper in a small shop.  He works about 9 hours daily and believes he’s getting ahead because he’s very responsible and above all meets his customers’ expectations.

Jhon is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy hammers, pliers and wrenches, among other and supplies like paint and cement, among others to do some improvements to the house he lives in which will improve his quality of life and he will be able to have the tools needed to do his work and he will be able to continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to attend university and be able to support his family so they can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy building supplies like hammers, wrenches, paint, cement, etc.

loans.name: Santos Virgilio

texts.es:
Santos es una persona de 42 años, es casado y tiene dos hijos. es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta, servicial y responsable; trabaja en la agricultura sembrando maíz y maicillo, también trabaja en la comercialización de animales el tiene de trabajar desde  la edad de los 20 años; ya que su padre le enseño a cultivar maíz y el comercio de animales a medida que fue creciendo el fue aprendiendo y obteniendo mas experiencia en el cultivo y en la comercialización de animales. Luego, se caso formando una familia formada por 2 hijos 1 varón y una hembra el varón tiene 10 años y la niña tiene 6 años; el varón estudia, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Hoy en día se dedica a la comercialización del ganado y de cerdos. Junto con otra persona compra animales, de esa manera lleva el sustento diario a la casa donde lo esperan su esposa y sus hijos.

para compra los animales tiene que trasladarse a los tiangues mas cercano a pie o en autobús, la distancia que debe recorre de su casa al tiangue es  de 10 kilómetros y otro esta a 20 kilómetros. Una vez comprados los animales los traslada   arriandolos en la carretera hasta llegar a su casa.


    El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar unos animales y pagar el restante del crédito que tiene pendiente.  La necesidad que sera satisfecha es la compra de los animales; ya que es el medio de sustento que tiene para sostener a la familia ya que lo que obtiene en la agricultura no es mucho; pero no deja de sembrar para tener también un poco de maíz para comer. Al vender los animales cuando estén gordos, recibirá mayores ingresos que le permitirán pagar muchas cosas como la energía eléctrica, comprarle zapatos, ropa, entre otras cosas básicas a su familia.

 En el futuro planea arreglar el techo de su casa por que la madera que sostiene el techo ya esta un poco arruinada y piensa hacerlo después que el invierno pase.
texts.en:
Santos, 42, is married and has two children.  He’s a very hardworking, honest, service-oriented, responsible person.  He works in agriculture growing corn and sorghum and also works selling animals.  He’s been working since the age of 20 since his father taught him to grow corn and as he grew he learned how to buy and sell animals.  He gradually obtained more experience growing crops and selling animals.  Later he got married and formed a family consisting of two children, a 10-year-old boy and a 6-year-old girl; his son is attending school and his wife takes care of the household chores.  Today he works selling cattle and pigs.  He and another person buy the animals and this is how he provides his home with daily sustenance where his wife and children wait for him.

In order to buy the animals he must travel to the nearest street market either on foot or by bus.  The distance he must travel from his house to the market is 10 kilometers to one of them and the other one is 20 kilometers away.  Once the animals are purchased he herds them home along the highway until he reaches his house.

The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy some animals and also to pay off a pending loan he has.  The need that will be met is the purchase of the animals since this is his source of support for his family because what he earns from agriculture isn’t very much but he doesn’t stop planting in order to have a little corn to eat.  By selling the animals when they are fat he will earn higher income that will make it possible for him to pay many things like electricity and to buy shoes and clothes among other basic things for his family.

In future he plans to repair the roof at home because the wood that holds up the roof is a bit deteriorated and he intends to do it before winter passes.

loans.use: to buy some animals and to pay off a pending loan he has.

loans.name: Reina Carolina

texts.es:
Reina, se dedica al cultivo de pipianes y a la venta de sandalias, es una persona de hogar, vive con su esposo y una hija, ella aprendió con sus padres a realizar la siembra y tambien el comercio, lleva dos años realizándolo.
Ella necesita realizar la inversión en una nueva siembra de pipianes, se comprara abono, herbicidas, para preparar la tierra y hacer el cultivo, tambien comprara una variedad de sandalias, con esto tendrá lo necesario para continuar trabajando y mejorar los ingresos para el hogar.
Su sueño es ampliar el negocio, construir su propia casa y agregar otro tipo de productos a su actividad.
texts.en: Reina works growing pipianes (a type of squash) and selling sandals. She works from home and lives with her husband and daughter. Reina learned to grow and sell pipianes from her parents. She has had these businesses for two years. Reina needs to invest in a new crop of pipianes. For this she will buy fertilizer and weedkiller to prepare the land for her crops. She will also buy a variety of sandals so she can continue working and increase her household income. Reina's dream is to expand her business and build her own house. She also hopes to add some other products to her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, weedkiller, and a variety of sandals.

loans.name: Hernan

texts.es: Hernán, tiene 37 años de edad, es soltero, vive en el municipio de Ilama, Santa Bárbara. Desde joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura. Hace 15 años que comenzó con el cultivo de café. La producción la vende en el mercado local en pergamino húmedo. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 4,000 lempiras para limpieza y fertilización de la finca de café con el fin de tener un mejor desarrollo de sus cultivos. Su sueño es seguir produciendo la tierra y obtener mejores resultados.
texts.en: Hernán is 37 years old. He is single and lives in the municipality of Ilama, Santa Bárbara. Since he was young, Hernán has been farming. Fifteen years ago, he began to grow coffee. Hernán sells his crops in a local market in packaged in moist parchment. Hernán has decided to request a loan of 4,000 Honduran lempiras in order to clean and fertilize his coffee plants. This will help him to better care for his crops. Hernán's dream is to continue producing on his land and become more successful.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plants by cleaning and fertilizing his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Balasan

texts.en:
Balasan is 50 years old. She and her family live in Sevan city, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Balasan lives with her husband and son, who is going to serve in the army. Her daughter is married and she lives separately with her family. Her husband works at the nearby village school as a military leader. Balasan has a specialty in technician-technologist, but now she has her own business. For 15 years she has been engaged in the cloth trading business using a rented stall. Balasan brings all the products from Yerevan wholesale markets in a rented car. 
It is obvious that the costs of her business are high and she is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy a lot of autumn-winter women's clothes to refresh her previous collections.

loans.use: To buy a lot of autumn-winter women's clothing

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es:
Henry, es empleado y tambien administra un negocio de vidrio, es un hombre de hogar, vive con su esposa; Henry aprendió el negocio como ayudante, luego obtuvo un empleo y además instalo su propio negocio, en el cual tiene 5 años.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de vidrio y material para trabajar con el vidrio, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar su trabajo, teniendo más material para seguir atendiendo a los clientes.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio más amplio, comprar herramientas necesarias y seguir trabajando por su hogar.
texts.en:
Henry, is employed and also has a glass business. He owns a home and lives with his wife. 

Henry learned the business as an assistant, then got a job and also started his own business which he has had for five years. 

He is asking for a loan to buy glass and material to work with the glass. This loan will help him to improve his work since he will have more material and he can keep serving his customers. 

His goal is to have a bigger business, buy the necessary tools and to keep working for his home.

loans.use: to buy glass and material to work with the glass.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik does his best to provide minimum living conditions for his parents and sister. The family lives in Salvard village of the Syuniq region, which is famous for its severe and cold climate. Andranik is involved in cattle breeding and some limited land cultivation. On his farm, Andranik keeps cows, calves, chickens, pigs and sheep. On the family's land he cultivates wheat, barley, and potato and sells the harvest locally. Despite his young age, Andranik is skilled and devoted to his work as a farmer. Andranik learned how to run a farm when he was very young and now he has become an experienced farmer who is the family's only breadwinner.
Now Andranik wants to enlarge the cattle he breeds, but has no financial means for that. He has applied for this loan to purchase a cow and a calf. This will increase agricultural income and Andranik will be able to improve his and his family's living conditions.
He waits for your support.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and a calf

loans.name: Johanna

texts.en:
Johana lives in the Muranga area of Kenya, which produces coffee for export. He has 9 children and has been doing this work for 25 years. His primary income sources are tea crops.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming is selling farm produce. His biggest challenge is cultivating. Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Kabiru.'

Johana was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, he replied, "It is helping farmers do agri- business." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'How to manage his finances.'

His highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked how will this loan benefit his family, Johana replied, "It will improve our living standards."

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Johana owns the following: a cow, pump, bicycle, motorcycle' but he does not own a pig, poultry, or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household mosquito net, electricity, running water, TV, and DVD but does not have solar power or a sewing machine.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: to purchase a dairy goat.

loans.name: Fredis Leonel

texts.es:
Fredis tiene 31 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos de 6 y 3 años respectivamente, uno de ellos ya asiste a la escuela. Es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta, servicial y responsable. Es motorista de una mototaxi,  desde  la edad de los 19 años.
	EL joven se a dedicado solo al trabajo de motorista de la mototaxi. no se le ha presentado otra oportunidad de trabajo;  ya que en un tiempo su padre dejo a su madre y le toco que trabajar para ayudarle a su madre, luego su madre viajo a los estados unidos, para darle una vida mejor y se quedo con sus abuelos con el tiempo él se acompaño y hoy en día trabaja día a día para  llevarle el sustento a su familia. 

    El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar los repuestos de la mototaxi, debido a que esta dañada y no puede seguir trabajando así. Él menciona que mejorara su vida, por que al arreglar la mototaxi podrá compensar los días atrasados, que no a podido trabajar con su mototaxi; sino que ha estado trabando con una prestada y los ingresos no son lo mismo.
texts.en:
Fredis is 31 years old. He and his partner have two children, ages 6 and 3. The oldest child is currently in school. Fredis is a hardworking, honest, helpful, and responsible person. He has worked as a taxi driver since he was 19.  He has not had any other job opportunities, so driving his motor taxi is the only work he knows. When he lived with his parents, he had the responsibility of helping his mother, so he was not able to learn any other trade. Fredis' mother later left for the United States to help provide for their family, so Fredis lived with his grandparents. Currently, he works to help provide for his family.

The loan Fredis is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to pay for some repairs to his motor taxi that is damaged to the point where he cannot work in it. Fredis comments that while his motor taxi has been damaged, he has been borrowing one to work with, but he is still behind because the profit isn't the same with a borrowed taxi.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motor taxi because it is damaged and he cannot work with it until it is fixed.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: Beatriz Elena es una mujer de 47 años de edad, es casada y madre de un hijo. Actualmente se dedica a la actividad de la confección a terceros desde hace seis años, luego de capacitarse en el área de diseño de modas. Es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, cada día trabaja en arduas jornadas para poder cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y de esta forma conseguir los ingresos para apoyar el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el crédito que solicita en la Corporación desea hacerle mantenimiento a sus máquinas y comprar insumos (hilos, telas, resortes, botones) al por mayor y aprovechar el descuento que le hacen, para así tener la disponibilidad que requiere para cumplir  a tiempo con los encargos. Su mayor sueño es hacer crecer su negocio para brindar oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de familia y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Beatriz Elena is a 47-year-old married woman and mother of one son.  She currently works sewing for third persons, she’s been doing this for six years after taking clothes-making courses.  She’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who puts in a hard day's work every day in order to fill customer orders and earn income to support her home.  

She wants to use the loan she’s asking from the Corporación to service her sewing machines and to buy supplies (thread, fabric, elastic, and buttons) at wholesale to take advantage of the discounts they offer her so that she can have supplies on hand needed to fill her orders on time.  Her greatest dream is to make her business grow so that she can offer employment to mothers who are heads of household and to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to service her sewing machines and to buy sewing supplies at wholesale.

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
La señora Aida es comerciante  tiene 43 años, está casada con Francisco, juntos tienen un puesto de ventas de termos guampas  calzados y juguetes en general en la terminal hace mas de 12 años atienen  las 24 horas del día. Viven en casa propia en la ciudad de Encarnación, tienen 4 hijos 2 de ellos aun pequeños, que dependen de ellos.
Aida  ya cuenta con una importante clientela formada ya que también llevan  a distribuir  hacia la colonia de la ciudad. Gracias a esta actividad  ha podido salir adelante, mantener su hogar y solventar cualquier gasto imprevisto, operan con la Fundación Paraguaya desde el año 2004
La  Señora Aida ha solicitado este crédito para la compra de colchas frazadas para la venta, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir trabajando y mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
Aida, 43, is a merchant.  She’s married to Francisco and together they have a stand in the terminal selling thermoses, mugs, shoes and toys in general; they’ve been in business 12 years and are open 24 hours a day.  They live in their own house in the city of Encarnación and they have four children two of which are still little and dependent on them.

Aida has a well-established regular clientele because they also distribute in the city’s neighborhood.  Thanks to this activity she’s been able to get ahead, to support her home and to cover unexpected expenses.  They’ve worked with Fundación Paraguaya since 2004.

Aida has requested this loan to buy quilted blankets to sell because she’ll be able to continue working this way and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy quilted blankets to sell.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El señor Victor tiene  32 años, está casado hace 8 meses con la señora Ana de 19 años, la pareja ya tiene un hijo de 3 meses que vino a alegrar la familia.
El Sr. Victor tiene su negocio de copetín desde hace 3 años ubicado en un lugar muy bueno de la ciudad, cuenta con clientela formada debido al buen servicio que ofrece y también le surte a otros negocios dedicado al mismo rubro con productos no cocinados, el objetivo de ellos es seguir mejorando el servicio que ofrecen y así seguir progresando.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de materia prima como harina, aceite, carne, gaseosas, jugos naturales, golosinas y así ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes y por ende aumentar sus ingresos mensuales.
texts.en:
Víctor, 32, has been married for 8 months to Ana, 19.  The couple already has a 3-month-old son who came to gladden the family.  Víctor has had his snack bar business for three years located in a very good spot in the city.  He has a well-established clientele because of the good service he provides; he also supplies other similar businesses  with products that don’t require cooking.  Their objective is to continue improving the service they offer and thus continue making progress.

He’s requesting this loan to buy raw materials like flour, oil, meat, soft-drinks, natural juices and snacks thus offering a variety of products to his customers and as a result increasing his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, meat, soft-drinks, fruit juice, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Vicente Saúl

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 30 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Desde hace 10 años es albañil, a él le llamo la atención este oficio pues su tío se dedica a esto mismo.  Cuándo ya podía hacer el trabajo decidió construir una casa por si solo y fue como aprendió el oficio.
El préstamo que esta solicitando  Fundación Campo, es para comprar 150 bloques, 10 bolsas de  cemento y con el resto del crédito cancelar la mano de obra no calificada, para levantar el techo de su cocina. La necesidad de levantar su techo; ya que está muy bajo y a veces se le filtra el agua y es preocupante su situación por lo tanto con el crédito vivirá mejor tendrá más comodidad. Además, mejorara porque ya no sufrirán tanto calor a la hora de estar cocinando. Él pretende construir un muro de retención porque en la parte de atrás de su casa el paredón está muy cerca y cuando llueve fuerte se desprende tierra y le daña la pared.
texts.en:
Vicente, 30, is married and has two children. For the past ten years he has worked as a mason. He was interested in this work because his uncle is also a mason. 
Once he was able to do the work he decided to construct a house by himself. This is how he learned the trade. 

The loan requested by Fundación Campo is to buy 150 blocks, 10 bags of cement and with the rest of the credit to cancel the laborers that are unskilled to raise the roof in his kitchen. 

He needs to raise the roof since it is now very low and sometimes water seeps through. The situation is worrisome and with the loan he will live better and more comfortably.

Also it will improve because it will not be as hot in the kitchen when cooking. 

He plans to build a retention wall because in the back on the house the wall is too close and when it rains hard the ground loosens and damages the wall.

loans.use: to buy 150 blocks, 10 bags of cement and with the rest of the credit to cancel the laborers that are unskilled to raise the roof in his kitchen.

loans.name: Idalia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Idalia, necesita iniciar la siembra de maíz y quiere comprar los insumos agrícolas, como abono, herbicidas, foliares, esto le ayudara a mejorar la productividad de su cultivo, a que sus ingresos los invierta en el consumo de sus gastos básicos en el hogar y la educación de sus hijos.
Con la inversión anterior, ha mejorado su situación económica, están  muy  bien de salud su familia y ella.
texts.en:
Idalia needs to start planting corn and wants to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and plant fertilizers. 

This will help her improve productivity of her crops.

She will invest the loan in the consumption of basic needs for the house and her children's education. 

With the last loan she was able to improve her economic situation. Her and her family are very healthy.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and plant fertilizers.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 42 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene tres hijos. Desde pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura aproximadamente 32 años, aprendió el oficio de su padre quien siempre le instruyo para que lo aprendiera.
El cliente manifiesta que comprara 4 quintales de fertilizante, dos quintales de concentrado para alimentar a 1,000 peces y el resto del financiamiento lo invertirá en la pequeña tienda que posee. Con la inversión, desea ver un buen cultivo es decir proporcionarle todo el manejo y mantenimiento que requiere y alimentar bien sus peses, para mejorar porque sacara una mayor producción, y obtendrá así más  ingresos, además sacara más rápido, al mercado su producción de peses lo que le permitirá cumplir todas las demandas de su hogar.
 Planea ampliar sus peceras, es decir sus estanques, y meterles mas peses para que se reproduzcan y obtener así más rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Francisco, 42, has a spouse and three children.  Since childhood he’s worked in agriculture, about 32 years now.  He learned the occupation from his father who always taught him so that he’d learn it.

He states that he will buy 4 quintals of fertilizer, two quintals of feed concentrate to feed 1,000 fish and the rest of the loan will be invested in the small store he has.  With this investment he hopes to see a good crop, that is, to provide it with all the care and maintenance needed and to feed his fish well in order to improve because he’ll get a better harvest and thus earn higher income.  Besides, he’ll get his fish production to market sooner which will make it possible for him to meet all his demands at home.

He plans to enlarge the fish tanks and fill them with more fish so they will reproduce to earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to invest in his small store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ten sheets of sheet roofing for his house, two quintals of feed for his chickens and two quintals of fertilizer.

loans.name: Romualdo

texts.es:
Romualdo tiene 47 años de edad, tiene dos hijos.  Desde joven se dedica a la agricultura, mas o menos 35 años de experiencia, siempre ha sido agricultor.
El cliente manifiesta que comprara 5 quintales de fertilizante,  cancelara  la mano de obra para que  le preparen la parcela donde quiere sembrar yuca.	 La necesidad de ampliar sus cultivos, es decir sembrar más de lo que acostumbra sembrar pues no tiene otra fuente de empleo que le permita salir adelante.
Así, mejorara sus ingresos al sacar la cosecha y darle mejor atención a sus hijos ya que ellos necesitan lo mas básico; pues aun están pequeños y necesitan alimentación digna, vivienda y los cuidados que requieren. Su deseo, es comprar otro pedacito de terreno que esta cerca de su casa y heredárselos a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Romualdo, 47, has two children.  He’s worked in agriculture since he was young, for about 35 years now more or less; he’s always worked in agriculture.

He states that he wants to buy five quintals of fertilizer and to pay for labor costs to prepare a parcel of land where he wants to plant manioc.  He needs to expand his crop, that is to plant more than usual because he has no other source of employment that will allow him to get ahead.

Thus, he will improve his income when he gathers the harvest and will provide better attention to his children since they need the basics but they are still little and need proper food, housing and care.  His wish is to buy another small parcel of land that’s near his house to leave to his children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Christian

texts.es:
Christian tiene 20 años vive con sus padres y hermanos, trabaja en un servicentro encargado de una tienda  y por la noche va a la Facultad.
Es un joven muy trabajador, que se está esforzando por salir el día de mañana. El está cursando el primer año de la carrera de Ingeniería  Eléctrica,  y una vez  que termine su carrera quiere montar su propia empresa de esa forma ser independiente.
Solicita de este crédito para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Christian, 20, lives with his parents and siblings.  He works in a service center managing a store and attends classes at night.  He’s a very hardworking young man who is striving to get ahead in the future.  He’s in the first year of Electrical Engineering and once he finishes his career he wants to set up his own firm and be independent this way.  He’s asking for this loan to cover university tuition fees which will be of great help.  He’s grateful for the opportunity he’s getting which will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Shiela works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by selling charcoal.

Shiela is borrowing PHP 4,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream -- to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for the foods she prepares and sells

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, juntos administran una mini ferretería, venden CD Y DVD, tambien controles, gorras y otros productos, el aprendió el negocio por cuenta propia, antes era agricultor, ahora se ha vuelto comerciante y tiene 8 años de estar en el negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para surtir el negocio, CD, DVD, tenazas, estuches, controles, antenas, focos, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar una buena inversión para mejorar las ventas en el negocio.
 Su aspiración es mejorar el local de venta, su negocio ampliarlo y agregar más productos, tambien ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children. Together they run a small hardware store, where they sell CDs and DVDs, as well as remote controls, baseball caps, and other products. He learned this business on his own. He was an agricultural worker before, but now he has become a businessman and has been in this business for eight years.

He is asking for a loan to purchase more merchandise to stock his business, including CDs, DVDs, pliers, pencil cases, remote controls, antennas, and flashlights. This loan will help him invest in improving his business's sales. His goal is to improve his shop, grow his business, add more products, and help his children.

loans.use: to buy CDs, DVDs, pliers, pencil cases, remote controls, antennas, and flashlights.

loans.name: Estefanía

texts.es: Estefanía es una joven de 18 años de edad, es soltera y aún no tiene hijos. Actualmente se dedica a atender su negocio de venta de helados, el cual tiene hace 2 años, gracias a que su familia le enseñó a manejar el negocio. Es una joven muy enérgica y organizada lo que la ha llevado a organizar bien su negocio y acreditarlo. Con el préstamo que solicita en la Corporación desea comprar helados al por mayor y también, invertirá en activos fijos (sillas y mesas) para acreditar aún más su negocio y  de esta forma hacer que el local sea más agradable para los clientes, lo que le ayudará a incrementar sus ganancias. Su mayor sueño es hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y poder ofrecer otras oportunidades de empleo.
texts.en:
Estefanía is a young single 18-year-old; she does not have children yet.  She currently works tending to her ice-cream sales business; she’s been in it for two years thanks to her family teaching her how to manage it.  She’s a very energetic, organized young woman which has led her to organize and establish her business well.  

She will use the loan she’s asking from the Corporación to buy ice-cream at wholesale but she will also invest in fixed assets (tables and chairs) to establish the business even better and make the site more agreeable for customers which will help her increase profits.  Her greatest dream is to make her business grow to improve her income and be able to offer employment opportunities.

loans.use: to buy ice-cream at wholesale and also tables and chairs.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es una persona que el día de mañana quiere ser un buen profesional, es por eso que se está esforzando. Cuenta que su familia siempre lo ha apoyado y que está muy agradecido por ello.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, y cuenta que quiere poder ayudar a su familia por medio de sus estudios, y de esa forma poder retribuirles toda la ayuda que ellos le dieron.
Esta solicitando de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases, y también poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda y le permitirá seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Arnaldo’s a person who wants to become a good professional in future which is why he’s striving.  He relates that his family has always supported him and he’s very grateful for that.  He’s studying Agronomy and he relates that he wants to be able to help his family by means of his studies and repay them this way for all the help they’ve given him.  He’s asking for this loan to be able to pay for his classes and also to pay his fees which will be of great help for him to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay tuition and fees.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
Rosana es de la ciudad de Pilar, está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad, con la cual quiere crecer y ayudar a su familia.
Ella comenta que lo que la destaca de los demás estudiantes es que se dedica mucho a sus estudios, y que sobresale siempre.
Solicita de este crédito para poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual la ayudará mucho. Ella es una persona con gran potencial y lo demuestra por medio de su buen rendimiento en la universidad.
texts.en: Rosana is from the city of Pilar and is studying Accounting that she wants to grow and help her family with.  She comments that what sets her apart from the other students is that she is very dedicated to her studies and that makes her stand out always.  She requests this loan to pay her tuition which will be very helpful.  She’s a person with great potential that she demonstrates by her good results in university.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Adan

texts.es:
Adan es de la ciudad de Concepción, está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial, y cuenta que es una carrera que le gusta mucho.
Se esfuerza por poder ser un buen profesional, útil a las demás personas, y también a sí mismo. Su sueño es seguir estudiando y haciendo especializaciones una vez terminada su carrera.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases de la universidad, como así también comprar útiles para su carrera. Agradece por esta oportunidad que el esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Adán is from the city of Concepción and is studying Commercial Engineering; he says that it’s a career he likes very much.  He strives to become a good professional that’s useful to others and also to himself.  His dream is to continue studying and becoming specialized once he finishes his career.  He requests this loan to pay for his university courses as well as to buy school supplies.  He is grateful for this opportunity he’s getting.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to pay for school supplies.

loans.name: Romela

texts.en:
Romela is 53 years old and married. She has three children. Romela works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 11 years, and she also earns income by fattening pigs.

She requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more groceries to sell at her store. Romela has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF, before this loan. She aspires to save enough money to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell at her store.

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en:
Genalyn is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year, and she earns additional income by fattening pigs.

She is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional stock to sell at her store, including household goods like soap, shampoo, canned goods, and milk. Genalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell at her store, including household goods like soap, shampoo, canned goods, and milk

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Laurinda de 48 anos, é operária agrícola e trabalha das 6.30 as 15.00 hrs. Vive maritalmente há 32 anos e tem 4 filhos, dos quais apenas 1 estuda e os restantes já são maiores de idade. Sustenta também 1 neto que vive com ela.
Com o crédito quer comprar cimento, portas e janelas para dar continuidade a construção de sua casa.
Projectos para o futuro são terminar a construção de sua casa e comprar mobília.
Diz que irá pedir mais crédito para concretizar os planos traçados e para isso promete cumprir com o calendário de pagamentos.
texts.en:
48-year-old Laurinda is a farm worker and works from 6:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. She has been married for 32 years and has four children. Only one of her children is in school; the others are already adults. She also supports one grandson who lives with her.
With the loan she wishes to purchase cement, doors and windows in order to continue building her house.
Her future projects are to finish building her house and to buy furniture.
She states that she'll apply for more loans so that she can achieve the plans she has made, and for that reason she pledges to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase cement, doors and windows in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
João de 33 anos de idade, é técnico administrativo numa escola do nível secundário e nas horas vagas faz prestação de serviços de carpintaria na sua casa, onde conta com 2 trabalhadores. Vive na casa do pai, vive maritalmente há 8 anos e é casado oficialmente há 2. Tem 2 filhos ainda menores e sustenta também um irmão que vive com ele.
Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia e material para fazer aros, janelas e portas para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa.
O seu desejo é terminar a faculdade daqui a 2 anos, fazer a casa dos seus sonhos pois a que está a construir neste momento é temporária (só tem uma dependência), comprar uma viatura para ajudar nas deslocações e ter uma estrutura na sua casa reconhecida para continuar com os trabalhos de carpintaria.
Diz que gosta de trabalhar com a Hluvuku devido as modalidades de pagamento que são flexíveis e adaptadas às preferências do cliente e não tem demasiadas formalidades para aquisição do crédito.
texts.en:
33-year-old João is an administrative assistant in a high school. In his free time he works from home providing carpentry services and has two employees. He lives in his father's house and has been married for 8 years, having made it official 2 years ago. He has two underage children and also supports one brother who lives with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand and supplies for making window frames and doors, so he can continue building his house.
His wishes are to finish college within two years; to build his dream house, since the one he's currently building is a temporary one (it only has one room); to acquire a vehicle to help him get around; and to have a well-known space set up in his house in order to keep on doing his carpentry work.
He states that he enjoys working with Hluvuku because the repayment options are flexible and tailored to suit the client's preferences. Also, there aren't too many formalities for getting a loan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and supplies for making window frames and doors, so he can continue building his house.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
Arnaldo tem 48 anos, é militar e trabalha das 7h30 às 15h30. É casado há 5 anos e tem 4 filhos dos quais 2 estudam e os restantes são menores de idade.
Com o valor do empréstimo quer comprar cimento e areia, para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa.
No futuro espera fazer uma loja na sua casa que irá ajudar na ampliação da renda familiar.
Diz que irá pedir mais empréstimos e pagar nas datas certas.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 48 years old and a serviceman, and he works from 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. He has been married for five years and has four children. Two of his children study and the others are underage.
With the amount of the loan he wishes to purchase cement and sand in order to continue building his house.
In the future he hopes to set up a store in his house, which will help increase his family's income.
He states that he'll apply for more loans and make the repayments on the scheduled dates.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith es de la ciudad de Pilar, una persona muy trabajadora y que está luchando por crecer y mejorar su vida.
Ella cuenta que desea llegar a ser una licenciada ya que tendrá una salida laboral, y podrá ayudar a su familia por medio de sus estudios, hoy esta siguiendo la carrera de Ciencias en la educación, con lo cual desea poder ayudar a quienes, que, al igual que ella quieren aprender.
Solicita d este crédito para poder invertirlo en los gastos de titulación, ya que tiene  muchos trámites que realizar y quiere poder cubrirlos. También agradece por la ayuda que esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Judith is from the city of Pilar.  She’s a very hardworking person who is striving to grow and to improve her life.  She relates that she wants to get her bachelor’s degree because she’d have access to employment and be able to help her family by means of her studies.  She’s currently studying Education Science that she wants to use to be able to help those who like her want to learn.  She’s asking for this loan to pay her degree fees because she has many official transactions to carry out and she wants to be able to pay for them.  She’s grateful for the help she’s getting.

loans.use: to pay for degree fees.

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es: Hernán es un hombre de 46 años de edad, es casado y no tiene hijos. Llegó a la ciudad debido a la falta de empleo y dificultades económicas que tenía en el municipio donde vivía. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía como tendidos acolchados, tapetes, toallas, cortinas, entre otros, actividad que realiza hace tres años, cuando comenzó a ofrecerlas puerta a puerta en diferentes barrios de la ciudad y venderlas a crédito. El crédito que solicita lo desea invertir en la compra de más mercancía al por mayor (cobijas, acolchados, cortinas, toallas) ya que puede aprovechar los descuentos que le hacen por compra de contado y así poder generar buenas utilidades. Su principal sueño es hacer crecer su negocio para tener la posibilidad de ofrecer oportunidades de empleo, ya que quiere contar con el apoyo de 2 personas que le realicen el cobro de facturas.
texts.en:
Hernán is a 46-year-old married man; he does not have children.  He came to the city because of the lack of employment and economic difficulties in the town where he lived.  He currently works selling merchandise like quilted blankets, mats, towels and curtains, among others, an activity he’s been doing for three years since he started selling them on credit door to door in various neighborhoods in the city.

The loan he’s asking for is to buy more merchandise at wholesale (blankets, quilts, curtains and towels) because he can take advantage of discounts he gets for paying cash and his profits will be higher.  His main dream is to make his business grow so that he can offer employment opportunities because he wants to hire to people to collect payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia es una mujer de 36 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo de 2 años. Actualmente tiene un negocio de repostería, gracias a la capacitación que ha obtenido haciendo cursos; con este negocio genera ingresos económicos para suplir las necesidades de su hogar, ya que en este momento su esposo se encuentra desempleado.  El dinero que solicita es para invertir en otra capacitación que quiere realizar para complementar sus conocimientos y así poder ofrecer más variedad de productos a los clientes, lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos, para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Claudia is a 36-year-old married woman; she has a two-year-old son.  She currently has a pastry business thanks to training she’s gotten by taking courses.  With this business she generates income to meet her household needs since her husband is currently unemployed.  The money she’s requesting is to invest in another training course that she wants to take to add to her knowledge and be able to offer a wider variety of products to her customers which will lead to increased sales and increased income as a result so she can have better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a course.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A D. Teresa de 55 anos de idade, é viúva e vive na sua própria casa. Tem 5 filhos, 3 dos quais são maiores de idade e outro está a frequentar a escola no ensino secundário. Ela è empacotadora numa empresa de bananas.
O presente empréstimo será utilizado para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa, mais precisamente na compra de material de construção (portas, janelas, chapas, barrotes, cimento), no pagamento de transporte do mesmo material e no pagamento da mão-de-obra.
A D. Teresa tem como esperança melhorar as suas condições de vida.
texts.en:
Teresa is 55 years old and a widow. She lives in a house that she owns and has five children. Three of her children are adults and the other one attends high school. She's a packer for a banana company.
The current loan will be used to continue building her house, more specifically to purchase construction supplies (doors, windows, metal sheets, beams and cement) and to pay for transportation of the supplies and for labor.
Teresa's hope is to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (doors, windows, metal sheets, beams and cement) and to pay for labor and for transportation of the supplies, so she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es:
Eulogio proviene de una familia muy humilde, su padre ya falleció, y comenta que son varios hermanos, pero que solo él se quedo con mamá y la está ayudando, para el sustento del hogar, ya que ella es ama de casa.
El tiene como meta llegar a ser un gran profesional con lo cual quiere seguir ayudando a su familia. Cuenta que está siguiendo una licenciatura en didáctica universitaria.
Dice también que por medio de estos estudios podrá ayudar a las personas que quieran aprender de igual manera que el.
Solicita de este crédito para poder cubrir los gastos de sus clases, y también para poder comprar los materiales de sus estudios.
texts.en: Eulogio comes from a very humble family; his father is already deceased and he comments that he has several siblings but only he stayed with his mother and is helping her to support the home since she’s a housewife.  His goal is to become a professional in order to continue helping his family.  He relates that he’s studying for a bachelor’s degree in university teaching.  He also says that by means of his studies he will be able to help people who want to learn the same way he does.  He’s asking for this loan to cover the costs of his courses and also to be able to buy his study materials.

loans.use: to pay for his courses.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres trabajadoras está en su primer ciclo , ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, y quieren crecer por medio de las capacitaciones y con la ayuda de la fundación paraguaya. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Norma, ella, a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa  quiere superar su pobreza. Ella se dedica a las ventas, y tiene una pequeña despensa con la que surte y da a sus vecinos los insumos para el día a día.
Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de verduras, frutas, leche, panificados y demás, con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas y ayudar así a su familia con los ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called “Mujeres Trabajadoras” (Working Women) is in its first cycle.  They are learning to work together and want to grow by means of the training and with help from Fundación Paraguaya.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey in order to know the situation each one of them is in.

One of the members is Norma.  Through her effort and non-stop work and by applying vital behaviors of a successful woman she wants to overcome her poverty.  She works in sales and has a small grocery store that she stocks and provides her neighbors with the things they need daily.

She’s requesting this loan to buy vegetables, fruit, milk, baked goods and others so she can continue with her sales and help her family with the income this way.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, milk, baked goods, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy salon items for her beauty salon business

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel works hard to support her family. She is married. She has a barber shop business in the Philippines, a business in which she has been involved for three years.
